2085020.name: Drill and Dig!
2085020.description:
2D arcade roguelike about digging blocks and collecting resources

Have you ever dreamed of mining a whole bunch of gold, diamonds and priceless artefacts? The time is now!

Take control of a real drilling rig! Start with a small coal-fuelled drill and you can turn it into an impenetrable tank to drive through mines and lava! Or get a nuclear engine along with fancy resource gathering tools and you can afford any upgrade you want! What if you become a mobile bomb yourself and have some real fun with destruction and explosions? Find out what tactics and strategy will allow you to take the top spot among the best players and earn the title of legendary treasure hunter!

Keep an eye on the fuel, dig blocks, blow things up and find out what's hidden in the depths of the mine besides riches and glory! Welcome to Drill and Dig! Treasure and adventure await!

FEATURES

  • Unusual arcade digging mechanics

  • An engaging storyline and various quests

  • Lots of treasures and artifacts to discover

  • Numerous upgrades for the drill

  • Skills that can be combined during a single run

  • Challenges like obstacles, traps, and enemies

  • Multiple worlds with their own features
